title: Lotus leaf-inspired thermal insulation and anti-icing topography
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18798-18806
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02843K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jianjun Cheng, Yi Zhu, Fei Zhan, Lei Wang
The rough surface and porous interlayer of lotus leaf transfers its stress from its upper surface to the interlayer, which is bio-fabricated by integrating a micro-cone array surface and porous interlayer.
